rtrek

The rtrek package provides Star Trek datasets and related R functions.

Installation

Install the development version pf rtrek from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("leonawicz/rtrek")

  • Browse source code at
    https://​github.com/​leonawicz/​rtrek

    https://​github.com/​leonawicz/​rtrek/​issues
